TutorialScript.TutorialStep: It's yearbook day, and all anyone else can think about is writing something stupid on as many pages as possible.
Lil used hers to start a fire. But there's still a week of high school left. What to do?
She could go out with a bang, telling off all the posers and bullies who've pissed her off for a decade of public school. Like that stuck-up princess, Cassandra...
But that would be so maudlin. Maybe she ought to just make a clean break: no friends, no enemies, ditch this place for somewhere actually cool. But could she really say goodbye...?

Wait a minute. Maybe Lil could leave behind something better. Why not try to get Lucas and Phoebe together? Those two goofy emo twerps were obviously meant for each other. Lil could totally play cupid.
But as long as she's masterminding from the shadows... why not sabotage the populars? Their false friendships and eye-candy relationships are hanging by a thread that would be *so* fun to cut.
The last thing on Lil's mind is becoming the Prom Queen. But who knows? With a hot date and enough reputation, anything's possible.
Whatever happens, by Friday the yearbook's going to be the *last* thing on anyone's minds.
